pages.text: The $(d)Inventory Tester$() is placed on the side of an inventory and holds an item.$(br2)It emits a Redstone signal when that inventory is capable of accepting that item.$(br2)It also checks the $(o)side$() of the inventory it's attached to. If placed on the top of a Furnace, it will only check if the Furnace can accept the item from the top slot.
pages.title: Inventory Tester

pages.text: Because of that, you may also want to use the $(l:blocks/inventory_rerouter)Inventory Rerouter$(/l) to access the inventory's face from another side.$(br2)You can invert it in its GUI, so it emits a signal when the inventory cannot accept the item.
